void EntityMemberStats::Stat::tickAll ( double  deltaTime = 1.0  )  [static]

void EntityMemberStats::Stat::tickSome ( size_t  index,
size_t  total,
double  deltaTime 
) [static]

This method ticks a fraction of the statistics.

It is useful for spreading out the cost of updating statistics.

Parameters:
index The index of the portion to tick. Value in range [0, total).
total The total number of portions.
deltaTime The time since this portion was last ticked.
